Name: And They Shall Know No Fear
Transhuman Physiology
Description: Ignore to-hit penalty from one flesh wound

Name: Grav-chute
Description: Never suffers fall damage and never falls on another model

Name: Grapnel Launcher
Description: Climb any distance vertically when moving

Name: Shock Grenade
Description: Hit infantry -1 to hit and no overwatch.

Name: Meltagun
Description: If half range roll 2 damage dice and pick highest.

Name: Sniper Rifle
Description: Target character even if not closest. Additional mortal wound on 6+ wounding roll.
